title: Actuarial audit opinions (peer review)
dataVerified: Reviewing actuary name, original actuary name, audit findings, ASOP compliance assessment
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fabricated peer review reports for actuarial work. Domain binding verifies credentialed reviewing actuary. Actuarial Standards of Practice (ASOP) compliance verification. Professional liability protection. State regulatory requirements for certain actuarial opinions. Critical for actuarial accountability where peer review ensures professional standards.
